results.title: G.O.P. Contenders Feed Voter Distrust in Courts, Schools and Military
results.abstract: As Donald J. Trump has escalated his attacks on the justice system and other core institutions, his competitors for the Republican nomination have followed his lead.

media.caption: Gov. Ron DeSantis of Florida is one of several Republican candidates for president who have sown broad suspicion about once-trusted institutions. “The military that I see is different from the military I served in,” Mr. DeSantis said recently.

results.title: Is Social Justice for the Birds? Audubon Attempts an Answer.
results.abstract: A battle over the group namesake’s ties to slavery grew into a conflict over diversity, highlighting complications that have arisen in the aftermath of George Floyd’s death.

media.caption: “Why would you not take the step of being brave and moving forward?” said Jason Hall, a birder in Pennsylvania, adding that dropping the Audubon name would help the organization appeal to a younger, more diverse crowd.
media.copyright: Kriston Jae Bethel for The New York Times

results.title: Hank the Tank, a 400-Pound Bear Behind Lake Tahoe Break-Ins, Is Captured
results.abstract: A female bear — and one of three known as Hank — was captured with her three cubs by California wildlife authorities. She was responsible for at least 21 home break-ins, officials said.

media.caption: A female bear known as 64F turned out to be the most notorious of the bears known as Hank the Tank that were involved in property damage in Tahoe Keys.
media.copyright: California Department of Fish and Wildlife, via Associated Press
